mapper.select: select beanimgno, beanoriginname , beanstoredname, beanimgsize from beanimg order by beanimgno
mapper.insert:
select bean_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO bean(BEANNO, BEANIMGNO, BEANNAME, ORIGIN , BEANCOMM, BEANINFO, BEANPRICE, BUSINESSNO) VALUES(#{beanNo}, #{beanImgNo}, #{beanName}, #{origin}, #{beanComm} , #{beanInfo}, #{beanPrice}, #{businessNo})
